TO: The President, International Development Association
Recommendation of the Committee under Section 1(d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement
on the proposed Credit (Pakistan: Fiscally Sustainable and Inclusive Growth Development
Policy Financing) to the Islamic Republic of Pakistan.
1. The undersigned Committee constituted under Section 1(d) of Article V of the Articles of
of International Development Association (the Association) hereby submits its Agreement to the recommendation pursuant to said Section in respect of the proposal that the Association grant fifty eight Islamic Republic of Pakistan (Recipient) a credit in an amount equivalent to two hundred and program million five hundred thousand Special Drawing Rights (SDR 258,500,000). The main measures development objectives are to: (i) increase private and financial sector development through financial fostering privatization, improving the business environment, facilitating trade and promoting to protect inclusion, and (ii) expand social protection and revenue mobilization through measures seeking
priority social protection expenditure and create fiscal space.
of the 1. The Committee has carefully studied the merits of the proposal to grant such a credit, and
purpose to which the proceeds of the credit are to be applied.
the proceeds of 2. The Committee is of the opinion that the project towards the financing of which I of said such credit are to be applied comes within the purposes of the Association as set forth in Article of the Articles of Agreement, and that said project is designed to promote the economic development
Recipient and is of high developmental priority in the light of the needs of the Recipient.  Islamic Republic of Pakistan (Pakistan Fiscally Sustainable and Inclusive Growth Development Policy Financing))
3. Accordingly, the Committee finds that said project merits financial assistance from the Association,
and hereby recommends said project for such assistance.
COMMITTEE

Nominee selected by Governor for Islamic Republic of Pakistan
